titles.title: Tribal Tax Incentive for Renewable Energy Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow allocation of certain renewable energy tax credits to Indian tribes, and for other purposes.
Tribal Tax Incentive for Renewable Energy Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Tribal Tax Incentive for Renewable Energy Act of 2015
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Indian tribes an election to transfer a portion of the energy tax credit to another taxpayer.
